bug_reporting.title: Bug reporting
bug_reporting.introduction: If you've submitted a bug via GitHub, debug logs can help us track down the problem.
bug_reporting.description: Debug logs contain application usage data including your username, the IDs or aliases of the rooms you have visited, which UI elements you last interacted with, and the usernames of other users. They do not contain messages.
bug_reporting.matrix_security_issue: To report a Matrix-related security issue, please read the Matrix.org Security Disclosure Policy.
bug_reporting.before_submitting: Before submitting logs, you must create a GitHub issue to describe your problem.
bug_reporting.additional_context: If there is additional context that would help in analysing the issue, such as what you were doing at the time, room IDs, user IDs, etc., please include those things here.

Your access token gives full access to y: Your access token gives full access to your account. Do not share it with anyone.
What's next for %(brand)s? Labs are the: What's next for %(brand)s? Labs are the best way to get things early, test out new features and help shape them before they actually launch.
Feeling experimental? Try out our latest: Feeling experimental? Try out our latest ideas in development. These features are not finalised; they may be unstable, may change, or may be dropped altogether. Learn more.
Something went wrong. Please try again o: Something went wrong. Please try again or view your console for hints.
Please verify the room ID or address and: Please verify the room ID or address and try again.
Please try again or view your console fo: Please try again or view your console for hints.
You are not subscribed to any lists: You are not subscribed to any lists
âš These settings are meant for advance: âš  These settings are meant for advanced users.
Add users and servers you want to ignore: Add users and servers you want to ignore here. Use asterisks to have %(brand)s match any characters. For example, @bot:* would ignore all users that have the name 'bot' on any server.
Ignoring people is done through ban list: Ignoring people is done through ban lists which contain rules for who to ban. Subscribing to a ban list means the users/servers blocked by that list will be hidden from you.
Your personal ban list holds all the use: Your personal ban list holds all the users/servers you personally don't want to see messages from. After ignoring your first user/server, a new room will show up in your room list named '%(myBanList)s' - stay in this room to keep the ban list in effect.

suggestions.allUppercase: All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase
suggestions.anotherWord: Add another word or two. Uncommon words are better.
suggestions.associatedYears: Avoid years that are associated with you
suggestions.dates: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you
suggestions.l33t: Predictable substitutions like '@' instead of 'a' don't help very much
suggestions.longerKeyboardPattern: Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns
suggestions.noNeed: No need for symbols, digits, or uppercase letters
suggestions.pwned: If you use this password elsewhere, you should change it.
suggestions.reverseWords: Reversed words aren't much harder to guess
suggestions.useWords: Use a few words, avoid common phrases

warnings.common: This is a very common password
warnings.commonNames: Common names and surnames are easy to guess
warnings.dates: Dates are often easy to guess
warnings.extendedRepeat: Repeats like "abcabcabc" are only slightly harder to guess than "abc"
warnings.keyPattern: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess
warnings.namesByThemselves: Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess
warnings.pwned: Your password was exposed by a data breach on the Internet.
warnings.recentYears: Recent years are easy to guess
warnings.sequences: Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to guess
warnings.similarToCommon: This is similar to a commonly used password
warnings.simpleRepeat: Repeats like "aaa" are easy to guess
warnings.straightRow: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess
warnings.topHundred: This is a top-100 common password
warnings.topTen: This is a top-10 common password
warnings.userInputs: There should not be any personal or page related data.
warnings.wordByItself: A word by itself is easy to guess
